1.title: Nick Swisher vs. Susanne the Fan

episode of.title: Chris Webber's Full Court Pranks (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Chris Webber gives his assistant a crash course in the art of pranking, an actor makes a big splash on his first day as coach, and World Series Champ Nick Swisher freezes up in front of a fan!

2.title: Terrell Owens vs. Justin the Fan

episode of.title: Chris Webber's Full Court Pranks (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: A delivery boy gets a valuable tip, don't deliver food to 3-time NBA Champ Rick Fox. Plus, a football fan volunteers to be a guinea pig for Terrell Owens, whose new energy bar will make you break more than a sweat!

3.title: Josh Norman vs Justin the Fan

episode of.title: Chris Webber's Full Court Pranks (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Living legend, Sir Charles Barkley gets ratted out by the cast of his own show, a sports fan loses all control while NCAA analyst Seth Davis tries to break some major news, NFL superstar and master of disguise, Josh Norman goes undercover to trash talk his biggest fan about...himself!

4.title: Shawne Merriman vs. Clarence the Fan

episode of.title: Chris Webber's Full Court Pranks (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: A super-fan thinks she's spending the day working out with softball legend Jennie Finch, but is instead thrown a wicked curve ball. And an ex-college football player can't keep Shawne Merriman from being sacked!

5.title: Paul Rodriguez vs. Erin the Fan

episode of.title: Chris Webber's Full Court Pranks (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: Travis Kelce enlists the help of a super fan to find endorsements he can really sink his teeth into, and skateboard legend Paul Rodriguez grinds all over one fan's nerves.

6.title: Goldberg vs. Guy the Fan

episode of.title: Chris Webber's Full Court Pranks (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: Baseball superstar Justin Turner shows one fan that baseball can be way more explosive than people think, a few patrons at a sports themed restaurant try a signature dish but end up getting way more than they signed up for, and one fan thinks he's tag team partners with wrestling legend Bill Goldberg but quickly finds out it's an every man for himself battle royal!

7.title: Shane Ray vs Michael the Fan

episode of.title: Chris Webber's Full Court Pranks (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: For as long as athletes have been playing sports, diehard fans have been worshipping them. This new series tests that idol worship as athletes play hilarious pranks on their biggest fans.

8.title: Hope Solo vs. Chyna the Fan

episode of.title: Chris Webber's Full Court Pranks (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: Olympic gold medalist Gabby Douglas goes undercover to flip the script on a fan at a cheerleading competition, and a Hope Solo fan wants to kick it with the Olympic legend, but Hope is more hands off than she expected.

9.title: Chris Webber vs Bo the Fan

episode of.title: Chris Webber's Full Court Pranks (TV Series 2017– )

9.plot: Broadcasting legend Rich Eisen shows one fan there's no such thing as a free lunch, an interactive video game gets a little too realistic, and Chris Webber teams up with former teammate Lou Williams to get things popping!

10.title: Connor Fields vs. Taina the Fab

episode of.title: Chris Webber's Full Court Pranks (TV Series 2017– )

10.plot: Josh Norman goes undercover again to talk to a super fan about how much he hates...Josh Norman, and one fan's desire to meet Olympic athletes gets her a wild ride with BMX legend and Olympic gold medalist Connor Fields!

11.title: Tara Lipinski vs. Valeria the Fan

episode of.title: Chris Webber's Full Court Pranks (TV Series 2017– )

11.plot: A pair of NASCAR enthusiasts get driven crazy when driver Kyle Larson surprises them with the ride of a lifetime; and skating legend Tara Lipinski recruits a big fan to be a whistle-blower.

12.title: Candace Parker vs Delmy the Fan

episode of.title: Chris Webber's Full Court Pranks (TV Series 2017– )

12.plot: Wrestling legend Bill Goldberg returns to show a fan that shooting a commercial is backbreaking work, then football star Travis Kelce comes back to test some products with a fan, and a confusing day at the spa leaves one fan unable to look up to WNBA Superstar Candace Parker anymore.

-1.title: Fan Slam

episode of.title: Chris Webber's Full Court Pranks (TV Series 2017– )

-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: For as long as athletes have been playing sports, die hard fans have been worshiping them. This new series shines a light on that idol worship and tests the bounds of fandom as athletes play elaborate and hilarious pranks on the "marks" who are suddenly face-to-face with them.
imdb.title: Chris Webber's Full Court Pranks
akas: Chris Webber's Full Court Pranks (United States)
plot: For as long as athletes have been playing sports, die hard fans have been worshiping them. This new series shines a light on that idol worship and tests the bounds of fandom as athletes play elaborate and hilarious pranks on the "marks" who are suddenly face-to-face with them.
